original: bag chags skyon gyi dri ma'i tha ba la //
analyzed: bag chags skyon gyi dri ma'i tha ba la //
translated: The hard stains of the faults of latent tendencies,

original: shes rab bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: shes rab bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs mdzad pa'i //
translated: The rain of the nectar of wisdom is poured down,

original: aa ra pa tsa na la gus btud de //
analyzed: aa ra pa tsa na la gus btud de //
translated: Respectfully bowing to Arapacana,

original: byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad /
analyzed: byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad /
translated: I will explain the ritual of the Bodhisattva Vajra Ma·πá·∏çala.

original: de la 'dir dus gsum cha mnyam pa bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas /
analyzed: de la 'dir dus gsum cha mnyam pa bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas /
translated: Here, one who wishes to perform the Ma·πá·∏çala of the Blessed Bodhisattva Vajra, with an equal share of the three times,

original: bla ma gsang sngags la mkhas pa /
analyzed: bla ma gsang sngags la mkhas pa /
translated: A guru who is skilled in secret mantra,

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pas /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pas /
translated: Residing in the way of the Great Vehicle,

original: slob ma ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma smin pa smin par bya ba'i phyir ri bo la sogs pa dgon pa'i gnas su mandala byas te /
analyzed: slob ma ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma smin pa smin par bya ba'i phyir ri bo la sogs pa dgon pa'i gnas su mandala byas te /
translated: In order to ripen those disciples who do as they are told, make a ma·πá·∏çala in a solitary place, such as a mountain, and so on.

original: stan bde ba la 'dug ste mchod pa bshams nas /
analyzed: stan bde ba la 'dug ste mchod pa bshams nas /
translated: Having arranged the offerings on a comfortable seat,

original: bdag nyid drag po chen po drag shul che ba bdud la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed par bsams la /
analyzed: bdag nyid drag po chen po drag shul che ba bdud la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed par bsams la /
translated: imagine oneself as the great wrathful one, who terrifies even the great terrifying ones, such as MƒÅra, and so on.

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bskrad de /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bskrad de /
translated: Having expelled all obstructors with the power of great magical power,

original: srid pa'i ri bo'i bgegs thams cad bcom la mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po'i ri bos bskor te /
analyzed: srid pa'i ri bo'i bgegs thams cad bcom la mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po'i ri bos bskor te /
translated: having destroyed all obstructors of the mountain of existence, and having surrounded oneself with a great vajra mountain,

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs su sprul te mchod pa chen po phul la bsam gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs su sprul te mchod pa chen po phul la bsam gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
translated: having emanated a great assembly of deities, and having made great offerings, one should abide in the samƒÅdhi of great concentration.

original: nam mkha'i khams su yi ge'i phreng ba snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas la //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su yi ge'i phreng ba snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas la //
translated: Having illuminated the realm of space with a great appearance of a garland of letters,

original: mkhas pa byang sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas 'grub par bya ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba dang / de'i byin rlabs las dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sprul pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / sgyu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs @15a * //
analyzed: mkhas pa byang sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas 'grub par bya ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba dang / de'i byin rlabs las dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sprul pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / sgyu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs @15a * //
translated: The supreme victor mandala is called the emanation of the assembly of mandala deities from those blessings.

original: kyi don grub par bya ba'i phyir las rgyal mchog dang de rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: kyi don grub par bya ba'i phyir las rgyal mchog dang de rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The supreme victor activity is for the sake of accomplishing the purpose of the assembly of deities of the great illusion.

original: de ltar lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor byar rung ba'i sa'i cho ga dang / slob ma snod dang ldan pa la sdom pa phog la dkyil 'khor bris te rgyan rnams dgram ste /
analyzed: de ltar lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor byar rung ba'i sa'i cho ga dang / slob ma snod dang ldan pa la sdom pa phog la dkyil 'khor bris te rgyan rnams dgram ste /
translated: Thus, having become close to the deity, the ritual of the ground that is suitable for drawing the mandala, the bestowal of vows to the qualified disciple, the drawing of the mandala, and the arrangement of the ornaments,

original: lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
translated: the placement of the deities is as follows: In the center is Bhagavat Bodhisattvatva Vajradhara with one face and two arms,

original: rdo rje dang dol bu can /üîΩmdun du rdo rje sems dpa'/
analyzed: rdo rje dang dol bu can / mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'/
translated: holding a vajra and a bell.üîΩVajrasattva is in front.

original: g-yas su rdo rje rin chen /
analyzed: g-yas su rdo rje rin chen /
translated: Vajraratna is to the right.

original: nub tu rdo rje chos /
analyzed: nub tu rdo rje chos /
translated: Vajradharma is in the west.

original: byang du rdo rje las rnams bri /
analyzed: byang du rdo rje las rnams bri /
translated: One should draw the Vajrakarma in the north.

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang // khyams rnams su bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa gzhag go //
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang // khyams rnams su bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa gzhag go //
translated: One should place the eight, beginning with the Vajrarati, in the eight directions, and the Bhadrakalpika Bodhisattvas in the surrounding galleries, and the Vajrahooks, etc., at the gates.

original: dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma bcug la de la dbang rnams bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma bcug la de la dbang rnams bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Having made offerings to that mandala with all the offerings, one should admit the fortunate disciples and confer the initiations on them.

original: rigs kyi bu de las yon gyi mchog blangs te lha dang slob dpon la mchod nas dkyil 'khor la bzod par gsol nas gshegs par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de las yon gyi mchog blangs te lha dang slob dpon la mchod nas dkyil 'khor la bzod par gsol nas gshegs par bya'o //
translated: Having taken the best of the sacrificial fees, O son of noble family, one should make offerings to the deity and the master, request forbearance from the mandala, and depart.

original: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bsdus la ci bde bar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bsdus la ci bde bar gnas par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should dissolve the mandala and remain as one pleases.

original: byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
analyzed: byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
translated: By whatever virtue there is from the mandala of Bodhicitta Vajra,

original: dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun //
translated: may all beings, having crossed the desert of existence,

original: srid pa'i dgon po las brgal nas //
analyzed: srid pa'i dgon po las brgal nas //
translated: attain the state of Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' thob par shog / byang sems rdo rje dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' thob par shog / byang sems rdo rje dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The mandala ritual of the bodhisattva Vajrasattva's consolation is complete.
